subject: Re: [junit] How to test a main(String[] args) method?
msgSnippet: ... Because we ve been conditioned to think that writing new code is a measure of progress.  Or perhaps because moving code is extremely risky without the
messageBody:
J. B. Rainsberger wrote:
>
> Why do we prefer to create code when we can simply move the code we have?
>

Because we've been conditioned to think that writing new code is a
measure of progress. Or perhaps because moving code is extremely risky
without the safety of tests. Either way, it's not a preference.

Mike
